msbt.message: Can you give me a tour? I'd love to see more of your decorating!
Do you have another room hiding behind that furniture?So cool It's like the hidden chambers in mystery stories!
You have so many things just lying around hereOh, I get it! You want to be able to grab them whenever you want. That's some creative thinking!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmmm You've made it hard to use your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Did you set this up as a puzzle for me to solve? I love mysteries!
You don't have any practical furnishings in here at all! A bold decorating choice
Now here's a setup that seems like it has a little of everything. Stylish, but also very functional!You did a good job with this. I feel like I should take notes!
You haven't cluttered your walls in here at all. I guess you must like things to be spare and neat.
This is one impressive collection of valuable furniture! Thanks for letting me in here to see this!
So many luxury items in one place! You really have a taste for high-end furnishings!
I've read about this Taking a minimalist approach to decor."Less is more," they say about this. Sleek, open, and probably easy to keep clean. I love rooms like this!
You have a lot going on in hereI like how you've filled the space but kept it cozy, not crowded.
I love what you've done in here! This room just has so much of your personality in it, you know?
This room is a real showcase., I feel like I can understand you better after seeing how you've decorated.
I bet you're proud of this room, aren't you? It really is nice in here, .
